reviews.review: 剧情真的震撼到我了，尤其是最后所有炮塔机器人一起唱歌的时候，一身鸡皮疙瘩，神作!
Очень интересная игрушка захватывает особенно сцены где не надо проходить испытание (многие достаточно сложные  и  не всегда получается пройти с первого раза)
Это одна из лучших игр Valve! я вам не рекомендую, а на оборот приказываю чтоб вы её купили!!!!

空间感十足的人要强力推荐，过关轻松愉快，反而是为了看话痨反派说话要经常停下来——两个AI说的话都太有意思了。
虽然单人剧情通关基本上都走单行道，但是自制关卡自由度很高，各种脑洞。可惜1的能量球似乎是被2的激光替代了，少了一种开关激活的方式，有点遗憾。
总体难度不高，卡关大多数是思维定势钻牛角尖造成的，也可能是还有隐藏条件没被发掘。只要条件都被发现了，过关就很简单。
之所以时长低是因为离线时间不计入，好像是软件通病了。传送门1不联网甚至都不给解锁成就，还要联网重新打一次才出来。一开始还以为是bug，因为只有传送门1有这个毛病，玩2就正常跳成就。
skadoo skadae this game needs large brain if u recently traded ur braincells for copys of highschool XDX uncensored then dont play if not havent fun remember wipe ur bottom after poopt
Really good game, tho I would like a 3rd part but Valve never does a 3rd part of a game

Wow, just..... wow. This game is amazing.

Pros:
- Fun interactions between characters
- Great storytelling
- A lot of easter eggs
- This game is much longer than Portal but it's still a game you can play after a day of work to just relax your mind
- Fun puzzles, they are not hard but you have to pay attention to your surroundings
- Great atmosphere

If you want to play a game that helps you relax and exercise your mind at the same time, you should play both this game and the first one.

This game is just absolutely fantastic. The story is engaging, the dialogue is some of the most intelligent and funniest I've heard, the level design is interesting, and the gameplay is enjoyable. Some of the puzzles are certainly harder than others, but the satisfaction of figuring them out for the first time is worth it. The majority of my experience is on Xbox, but the PC will provide endless hours of gaming through the co-op and workshop. For me this game excels in single player story, but if you have a friend to play with then the co-op is a fun time as well. Definitely worth the price.

Portal 2, gra logiczna w, której masz dwa portale, jeden wejściowy drugi wyjściowy a za pomocą tego rozwiązujesz łamigłówki w podziemnym kompleksie "naukowym". This is a wonderful game. It builds on Portal 1's mechanics and adds a bunch of cool new things. There was a couple of times where some puzzles i the singleplayer campaign felt a bit easy and unnecessary, but even with that the game is still incredibly awesome because of its puzzles and story.
